name: TI_5_1_1_Application_Interchange_Standards
title: TI.5.1.1 Application Interchange Standards (Function)
description: Support the ability to operate seamlessly with other systems by using applications, and/or structured messages and documents that adhere to interchange standards.
purpose: Placeholder - Not Defined at this time

statement.label: TI.5.1.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to receive and transmit information using interchange standards as required by realm / local -specific profiles, and/or by recognized jurisdictional authorities.

statement.label: TI.5.1.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to integrate with the operations of other systems that adhere to interchange standards as required by realm / local -specific authorities and/or by recognized jurisdictional authorities.

statement.label: TI.5.1.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [TI.4](Requirements-EHRSFMR2-TI.4.html) (Standard Terminology and Terminology Services) including all child-functions, to support terminology standards according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.

statement.label: TI.5.1.1#04
statement.requirement: IF a standard information model is not available, THEN the system SHOULD provide the ability to exchange information with other systems in a seamless manner by using a formal explicit information model.

statement.label: TI.5.1.1#05
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to exchange information with other systems by using an explicit formal information model, and/or by using a standard coded terminology.

statement.label: TI.5.1.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to receive and transmit data using standard, coded terminology.

statement.label: TI.5.1.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to export data using an explicit and formal information model in accordance with industry and governmental-mandated standards.

statement.label: TI.5.1.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to import data using an explicit and formal information model in accordance with industry and governmental-mandated standards.

statement.label: TI.5.1.1#09
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to harmonize data with another system.

statement.label: TI.5.1.1#10
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to determine whether the information transmitted to another system has been successfully received by that other system.

statement.label: TI.5.1.1#11
statement.requirement: The system SHALL store a log record of each data exchange (transaction) when transmitting information with external systems.
